description: Walk through each dashboard tab and modal, map UI-to-data connections, identify gaps, and assess test readiness.

userStories.title: Create dashboard page and modal inventory
userStories.description: As a system owner, I want a complete inventory of dashboard tabs and modals so I can see what is present and where it lives.
acceptanceCriteria: List all dashboard tabs (overview, sessions, syllabus, scholar, tutor, brain, sync) with sections and actions
List modals/overlays and their trigger locations
Include styleguide.html as a non-routed appendix with a purpose note
Include evidence paths (file paths or line refs)

userStories.title: Map UI to JS and API connectivity
userStories.description: As a system owner, I want a connectivity map so I can verify each UI action is wired to JS functions and backend handlers.
acceptanceCriteria: Map UI section/action -> JS function -> API endpoint -> backend handler
Reference dashboard.js and routes.py in the mapping

userStories.title: Document gaps and test readiness
userStories.description: As a system owner, I want gaps and test readiness documented so I know what is unused, broken, or ready to test.
acceptanceCriteria: List unused/unconnected UI elements or endpoints with evidence
Propose fixes with priority and rationale
